long_description: 3 of the most often-used Swix hydrocarbon waxes in 1 package make this an economical way to cover temperatures from 10degF to 34degF. This package contains 20g of CH6 Blue, CH7 Violet and CH8 Red hydrocarbon wax. Choose Blue (CH6) for temperatures from 10deg to 20degF (-6deg to -12degC). Choose Violet (CH7) for temperatures from 18deg to 28degF (-8deg to -2degC ). Choose Red (CH8) for temperatures from 25deg to 34degF (-4deg to 1degC).
short_description: 3 of the most often-used Swix hydrocarbon waxes in 1 package make this an economical way to cover temperatures from 10degF to 34degF.
